name: Aly
specialties: Oracle Fusion Cloud Integrations (ERP, HCM, EPM)

education.degree: Honours Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (Specialist in Statistical Machine Learning and Data Science, Co-op)

work_experience.title: Analyst | Applications Developer
responsibilities: Developed and deployed 5 C# .NET Core integrations in Azure DevOps as Azure Functions, implementing robust ETL pipelines to synchronize data between multiple cloud SaaS platforms and Oracle Fusion for seamless E2E integrations.
Maintained and enhanced a Python-based bot that automatically retrieves and distributes RFPs to stakeholders, including the CEO.
Created a C# .NET Core desktop data conversion application for Oracle modules, performing data validation and RESTful API uploads.
Developed 10+ Python automation scripts using Polars + RAPIDS (GPU) for processing large client datasets and invoking Oracle APIs.
Built SQL-based reports for clients by joining complex Oracle Fusion HCM and ERP subject areas (Personnel, Assignments, Compensation, Payroll).

work_experience.title: Data Scientist (CO-OP)
responsibilities: Implemented ETL-driven automation in supply chain operations, reducing manual work from 3–4 hours to 15–20 minutes daily.
Built Power BI dashboards to provide actionable insights to senior management and improve operational efficiency.
Developed Python scripts consolidating large datasets for reporting and resource optimization.

work_experience.title: Data Scientist (CO-OP)
responsibilities: Developed Python scripts consolidating 100+ supply chain data files for inventory dashboards.
Visualized work capacity distribution to improve task allocation and reduce overworked associates.

work_experience.company: Ontario Ministry of Government and Consumer Services
work_experience.title: Applications Programmer & Analyst (CO-OP)
responsibilities: Developed client-facing features using TypeScript, Java, and SQL to enhance UX and meet stakeholder requirements.
Created complex SQL queries and stored procedures to optimize backend data operations.

projects.name: Helpdesk Triage Agent
projects.description: FastAPI service combining a PyTorch sentiment classifier (DistilBERT SST-2) with LangGraph and LangChain for automated ticket triage, supporting CUDA/MPS/CPU with GPU half-precision inference.

projects.name: Flagging Loans Project
projects.description: Built a predictive model for loan risk assessment using Python, Scikit-learn, Pandas, and NumPy, achieving strong accuracy on imbalanced datasets.

projects.name: Top 1500 Steam Games Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed Steam’s top 1500 games by revenue; implemented a Gradient Boosting Regressor to predict game prices with 78% accuracy.

projects.name: Age Related Risk Analysis of COVID-19 Outcomes
projects.description: Used R Markdown, logistic regression, and bootstrap tests to analyze age-dependent COVID-19 mortality risks, validated with k-fold cross-validation.
